Uses of Class
boardgame.Position

Packages that use Position
Package Description
boardgame
This package corresponds to the game board layer.
chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of Position in boardgame

    Fields in boardgame declared as Position
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Position Piece.position  
    Methods in boardgame with parameters of type Position
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Piece Board.piece​(Position position)
    This method returns a piece belonging to the piece matrix associated with the board given a board position.
    void Board.placePiece​(Piece piece, Position position)
    Put a piece in a position of the pieces matrix belonging to the board.
    boolean Board.positionExists​(Position position)
    check if a certain position exists on the board or not given a position
    boolean Piece.possibleMove​(Position position)
    determines whether it is possible for a piece to move to a specific position.
    Piece Board.removePiece​(Position position)
    Removes a piece from the board located in the position on the board that was passed as the method parameter.
    boolean Board.thereIsAPiece​(Position position)
    checks whether in a position on the board, there is or is not a piece.

  • Uses of Position in chess

    Methods in chess that return Position
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected Position ChessPosition.toPosition()
    Converts a ChessPosition to a Position.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Position
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected static ChessPosition ChessPosition.fromPosition​(Position position)
    Converts a Position to ChessPosition.
    boolean ChessPiece.isThereOpponentPiece​(Position position)
    This method is intended to check if there is an opposing piece in a desired position.
    private Piece ChessMatch.makeMove​(Position source, Position target)
    contains the piece move logic of the ChessMatch.performChessMove(ChessPosition, ChessPosition) method.
    private void ChessMatch.undoMove​(Position source, Position target, Piece capturedPiece)
    undoes a chess move. removes the piece that was placed at the move target, and returns it to the move source position.
    private void ChessMatch.validateSourcePosition​(Position position)
    Validates a source position of the movement after verification of compliance of 3 possible conditions.
    private void ChessMatch.validateTargetPosition​(Position sourcePosition, Position targetPosition)
    It will check if the target position is valid, in relation to the source position of a movement.

  • Uses of Position in chess.pieces

    Methods in chess.pieces with parameters of type Position
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private boolean King.canMove​(Position position)
    determines whether the king can move to the position referred to as the method parameter.
    private boolean Knight.canMove​(Position position)
    determines whether a knight can move to the position referred to as the method parameter.
    private boolean King.testRookCastling​(Position position)
    this method tests whether in a given position there is a rook suitable for the castling special move. initially the Board.piece(Position) method returns a possible chess piece located in the position that was passed as a parameter.
